Package com.trendit.basesdk.device.printer

Class PrinterDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.trendit.basesdk.device.printer.PrinterDevice
  • public abstract class PrinterDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    PrinterDeviceDefine the interface of the printer device 
     PrinterDevice device = POSDeviceManager.getInstance().getPrinterDevice();
    The caller cannot create the object through new
